pages.text: You can construct a portal to the Twilight Forest, a new dimension with many new strucutres, blocks, gear, enemies, and bosses.

pages.title: Building the Portal
pages.text: This is how you build the portal. Throw a diamond inside to activate it.

pages.title: Entering the Portal
pages.text: One a diamond is thrown in, the portal will activate. You can jump in to travel to the Twilight Forest.
